verses.text: Ix yalanxi jun chi' t'ayin icha tik: Ach anima, k'uxb'at jun b'aj tz'ib'ab'il juntzanh lolonel tik, tzach b'at al t'a masanil heb' etisraelal, xchi t'ayin.
Ix in jacan in ti', ix yak'an in k'uxb'at jun b'aj tz'ib'ab'il chi'.
Elanhchamel ix yal t'ayin: B'uk'em jun tz'ib'ab'il ix wak' tik t'ayach, sb'ud'jicanel a k'ol yuj, xchi t'ayin. Yuj chi' ix in b'uk'emi, te chi' ix wab' icha nok' yalchab'.
Ix yalan t'ayin icha tik: Ixic, tzalan t'a heb' etisraelal jantac tas ol wal t'ayach.
Manh wanoc ach in checanb'at t'a skal heb' anima max yal alan sti', mato max nachaj uuj, palta ha t'a heb' etchonhab' tzach in checb'ati.
Manh wanoc ach in checanb'at t'a juntzanh nación b'aj tzijtum ti' tz'alchaji to ajaltac snachajel uuj. Tato ha t'a juntzanh chonhab' chi' tzach in checb'ati, tzam scha yab' heb' tas tzala'.
Palta a heb' etchonhab' chi' jun, manh ol schalaj yab' heb' t'ayach, yujto malaj sgana heb' schaan yab' tas swala', yujto te pit syutej spensar heb'.
Palta a in ol wak' a tek'anil t'a yichanh heb', yic ol a tek'b'an a b'a alan juntzanh lolonel tik t'a heb'.
Icha wal stzatzil k'een diamante, ma icha k'een yaxk'een ol ach wutoc t'a yichanh heb'. Manh jab'oc ol ach xiv t'a heb' wach'chom scot wal yowal sat heb' yuj spital, xchi t'ayin.
Ix yalanxi t'ayin icha tik: Ach anima, maclej wal ab' tas ol wal t'ayach, tza sik'ancan t'a a pensar.

Ixic, tzach b'at b'aj ayek' heb' etchonhab' ik'b'ilcot preso, tzalan t'a heb', taxonhej scha yab' heb' tas ol ala', mato maay, palta tzal t'a heb' icha tik: Icha tik yalan Jehová Cajalil, xa chi t'a heb', xchi t'ayin.
Ixlajwi chi', ix in yik'anchaanh Yespíritu Dios, haxo t'a in patic ix wab' yoch jun av icha sk'anh yek' quixcab', ix yalani: Alchajocab' wach'il t'a stziquiquial Jehová b'aj ayeq'ui, xchi.
Ix wab'anpax sk'anh sk'axil heb' querubín ayic syil-lan sb'a. Ha juntzanh xocanxocan junnhej yaj yet' heb', sk'anhpaxi, xiwub'tac sk'anhi.
Axo Yespíritu Dios ix in ik'ank'e waan, ix in yik'anb'ati. Te cusk'olal ix in aji, ix cot wowal, ix in b'ati. Axo spoder Jehová ayoch t'ayin.

Ayic ix in k'och t'a chonhab' Tel-abib t'a sti' a niwan Quebar, aton b'aj cajan onh ek' mach onh ik'b'il onh cot icha preso tik, uque' k'ual majxo in lolonlaj, yujto ix sat in k'ol yuj tas ix wila'' yet' tas ix wab' chi'.
Ayic ix lajwi uque' k'ual chi', ix lolon Jehová t'ayin, ix yalan icha tik:
Ach anima, a in ix ach wak'och stanhwumaloc heb' etchonhab' israel. Ayic ol walan in lolonel t'ayach, a achxo ol al t'a heb' in k'exuloc yic ol yojtaquejel heb'.

Ayic ol walan t'a junok mach to ol cham yuj smul, tato a ach tik manh ol al t'ay, manh ol a cacha' yic syactejcan chukal sk'ulej chi', yic max chami, ayic scham jun anima yuj smul chi', ha t'a ib'anh skan schamel chi' wuuj.
Palta tato tzal t'ay jun, tza cachanpax t'a schucal chi', palta max yaktejcan schucal b'eyb'al chi', ol cham yuj smul chi', a schamel chi' max canlaj t'a ib'anh.

Anhejtona', tato ay junok mach wach' sb'eyb'al, palta syactejcan swach' b'eyb'al chi', sk'ulan chukal, a in ol in cha swach' k'ulej chukal chi' masanto schami. Tato a ach tik max a cacha', tato schami, a tas wach' sk'ulejnac t'a yalanhtax chi' manhxalaj yelk'och t'a wichanh, ol cham yuj smul chi', palta haxo t'a ib'anh skan schamel chi' wuuj.

Palta tato tza cach jun anima chi' jun yic max sk'ulej chukal chi', schaan yab'i, maxtzac sk'ulej chukal chi'. Ha jun anima chi' olto pitzwoc eq'ui, yujto ix sk'anab'ajej b'aj ix a cach chi'. Ha achxo tik tzach colchajcani, xchi Jehová t'ayin.
Ix yak'ank'e sk'ab' Jehová t'a wib'anh, ix yalan t'ayin icha tik: Q'ueanh waan, ixic t'a jun ak'lic chi'. Ata' ol in lolon t'ayach, xchi.
Ix in k'e waan b'ian, ix in b'at t'a jun ak'lic chi'. Ata' ix wil stziquiquial Jehová, icha ix aj wilan t'a sti' ha' niwan Quebar. Ix in julanem lachnaj in b'ha t'a sat lu'um.
Ix och Yespíritu Dios chi' t'ayin, ix in yik'ank'e linhan, ix yalan t'ayin icha tik: Ixic, tza macanoch a b'ha t'a yol a pat.
Ach anima, ol ach tzek'chajcan t'a yol a pat, yic wach' maxtzac ach elta t'a skal heb' etchonhab'.
Ichato ol wak'cank'e lotzan ak' t'a a joom, yic wach' manhxo ol yal a loloni, manhxo ol yal a cachan heb', yujto te pit heb'.

Ayic ay tas snib'ej in k'ol ol ala', ol ach wak' lolonoc, ol alani: Icha tik yalan Jehová Cajalil, xa chi. Ha mach sgana schaan yab'i, yab'ocab'i. Ha pax mach malaj sgana schaan yab' jun, schumxo, yujto a jun chonhab' tik te pit, xchi Jehová.
